content: Absolutely wonderful experience! The staff went above and beyond to make our anniversary special. The room had a beautiful view of the city and was spotlessly clean.
Great location and comfortable beds. The breakfast buffet had plenty of options. Only minor issue was the WiFi being a bit slow during peak hours.
Disappointed with my stay. The room was smaller than expected and the air conditioning was noisy. Front desk staff seemed overwhelmed and check-in took forever.
Perfect business trip stay. Fast check-in, excellent gym facilities, and the executive lounge was a nice touch. Will definitely book again for my next visit.
Average experience overall. The room was clean but dated. Restaurant food was mediocre for the price. Location is convenient though, close to public transport.
